Arosa, GR, Switzerland > held on June 22nd & 23rd
34 Bands (mixed Brass/Wind & Sections; 3 Bands sep. with Evolutions 2 ranked/1 Expertise; Draws till 26 played on Saturday and 4 Bands could not compete due to Rain)
